item.description:
You Don't Mess With The Zohan

Adam Sandler is at it again, this time as Zohan, an Israeli counterterrorist killing machine. In between lobbing grenades and leaping from buildings, Zohan decides that what he'd really like to be doing is cutting hair. To escape his day job, he fakes his own death and books it to New York City, where a some "extra special treatment" for his clientele in the back room catapults him to fame and fortune. Unfortunately, success and secret identities don't mix, and his past begins to catch up with him.

Bet You Didn't Know
In his youth, Vidal Sassoon was the member of The 43 Group, a street-fighting anti-fascist force set up by Jewish veterans after World War II. Later he fought for Israeli independence before settling down to become a household name in hairdressing.

Zohan Theatrical Trailer
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby by Chatters at 6:30 p.m. I've posted this for the evening, since this time slot has been popular. If you'd rather do a matinee, add a comment when you rsvp, and I'll change it if enough people want the earlier time.
item.why: Hey, it's summer and that means time to kick back and enjoy the simple pleasures in life. Come eat popcorn and laugh until your sides hurt!
item.name: You Don't Mess With The Zohan
